entry.lex: The Acharya Institute of Technology's campus is in Soldevanahalli, Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore - 560090, India. It is affiliated to the Visvesvaraya Technological University in Belgaum and it has 700 postgraduate students.

The Acharya Institute of Technology in India which is affiliated with the Visvesvaraya Technological University in the city of Belgaum, has 700 postgraduate students. The campus is located at In Soldevanahalli, Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore – 560090.

entry.lex: The Acharya Institute of Technology in Karnataka, India is affiliated to the Visvesvaraya Technological University in Belgaum. Its director is Dr G. P. Prabhukumar.
Технологический институт Ачарья в Карнатаке, Индия является филиалом Технологического университета Висвесварайя в Белгауме. Его директором является д-р Г. П. Прабхукумар.

Dr G P Prabhukumar is the Dean of The Acharya Institute of Technology which is affiliated with the Visvesvaraya Technological University in the city of Belgaum, and is located in the state of Karnataka, India.
Доктор Г.П. Прабхукумар - декан Технологического института Ачарья, который является филиалом Технологического университета Висвесварайя в городе Белгауме и расположен в штате Карнатака, Индия.

Acharya Institute of Technology v Karnatace v Indii je přidružen k Visvesvaraya Technological University v Belgaumu. Ředitelem je Dr. G. P. Prabhukumar.
Dr. G. P. Prabhukumar je děkanem The Acharya Institute of Technology, který je přidružen k Visvesvaraya Technological University ve městě Belgaum a nachází se ve státě Karnataka v Indii.

entry.lex: The Acharya Institute of Technology's campus is in Soldevanahalli, Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore - 560090, India. It was established in 2000 and it is affiliated with the Visvesvaraya Technological University in Belgaum.

Кампус технологического института Ачарья находится в Солдеванахалли, Ачарья д-р Сарвапалли Радхакришнан Роуд, Хессаргхатта Мейн Роуд, Бангалор - 560090, Индия. Он был создан в 2000 году и связан с Технологическим университетом Висвесварайя в Белгауме.

The Acharya Institute of Technology which is affiliated with the Visvesvaraya Technological University in the city of Belgaum, India, was established in 2000. The campus is located at In Soldevanahalli, Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore – 560090.
